meanings.sent1: She aerobicized every morning to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: They aerobicized at the gym for an hour.
meanings.sent3: The penguin aerobicized by waddling around the iceberg.
meanings.sent4: His heart aerobicized like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Aerobicized activities make you breathe faster and your heart beat stronger.

meanings.definition: Having been subjected to aerobic exercise.
meanings.sent1: The aerobicized group felt energized after the workout.
meanings.sent2: Her aerobicized muscles were sore but strong.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked aerobicized after chasing the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The city had an aerobicized vibe with people jogging everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The aerobicized athletes were ready for the marathon.
